Old Spice Raptorstrike: Old Spice Raptorstrike is an aluminum-free deodorant for men, offering triple protection and a long-lasting dark berry scent for 24/7 freshness.
Metamucil Fiber: Metamucil Fiber from Procter & Gamble Co. is a plant-based psyllium fiber supplement that promotes digestive health, maintains healthy blood sugar levels, and helps lower cholesterol by forming a viscous gel that traps and removes waste and sugars.
Old Spice Ocean Legend: Old Spice Ocean Legend, from Procter & Gamble Co., is an antiperspirant and deodorant that combines the freshness of ocean elements with citrus and floral notes, offering long-lasting protection and a refreshing scent[1][2].
Tide Power Pods: Tide Power PODS from Procter & Gamble Co. are innovative laundry pacs that deliver more chemistry to clean deep between fibers, offering powerful stain and odor removal in a convenient, compact package[1][3].
Vicks: Vicks, a brand of over-the-counter medications owned by Procter & Gamble, offers a range of products including NyQuil, DayQuil, VapoRub, and cough medicines, known for relieving coughs and minor muscle and joint pain.
Mr Clean Magic Eraser: The Mr. Clean Magic Eraser from Procter & Gamble Co. is a powerful, all-purpose cleaning tool that uses micro-scrubbers to lift away dirt and grime with just water, suitable for various household and outdoor cleaning tasks.
Native: Native, a personal care brand acquired by Procter & Gamble Co., offers clean and effective products from naturally derived ingredients, including deodorant, body wash, hand & body lotion, shampoo, and conditioner, known for their cruelty-free and vegan formulations[2][3][4].
Oral-B: Oral-B, a leading oral hygiene brand from Procter & Gamble Co., offers a wide range of toothpastes, toothbrushes, electric toothbrushes, and mouthwashes, known for their innovative designs and high standards of safety and efficacy, including the first electric toothbrush to be accepted by the American Dental Association (ADA) [1][2][4].
Febreze Small Spaces: Febreze Small Spaces from Procter & Gamble Co. are compact air fresheners designed to eliminate odors in tiny spaces like bathrooms, closets, and laundry rooms, offering continuous freshness for up to 45 days with various scents like Linen & Sky and Mountain Air[1][2][5].
Procter & Gamble Co: Procter & Gamble Co is a global, publicly traded Fortune 500 company specializing in the manufacture and marketing of a diverse range of fast-moving consumer goods, including conditioners, shampoos, blades and razors, toothbrushes, toothpastes, and household cleaning products under well-known brands like Head & Shoulders, Tide, and Gillette[1][2].
This Is L: This Is L, acquired by Procter & Gamble, is a purpose-driven feminine care brand offering organic cotton tampons, pads, liners, and wipes, with a commitment to donating to causes improving girls' and women's access to period products worldwide[1][3][5].
Vicks Act 7: Vicks Act 7 is a single-tablet solution from Procter & Gamble Co., combining paracetamol, caffeine, chlorphenamine, and phenylephrine to alleviate the seven primary symptoms of cold and flu, such as headache, body aches, sneezing, watery eyes, sore throat, nasal congestion, and fever[1].
Mr Clean: Mr. Clean is a brand of cleaning products from Procter & Gamble Co., known for its powerful and versatile cleaning solutions, including the iconic Magic Eraser, which effectively removes tough stains and grime with minimal effort[1][3][4].
Crest Pro-Health: Crest Pro-Health from Procter & Gamble Co. is a toothpaste that provides comprehensive oral care by preventing cavities, gingivitis, plaque, and tooth sensitivity, while also whitening teeth and freshening breath.
Febreze Fade Defy: Febreze Fade Defy is a smart plug-in air freshener from Procter & Gamble Co. that uses microchip technology to maintain a consistent, long-lasting fresh scent for up to 50 days.
Align Bloating Relief Plus Food Digestio: Align Bloating Relief + Food Digestion from Procter & Gamble Co. is a probiotic supplement designed to relieve occasional bloating, gas, and abdominal discomfort by adding healthy bacteria and vitamin B12 to support digestive balance and food digestion[1][4].
Downy Amanecer: Downy Amanecer is a fabric softener from Procter & Gamble that provides a clean and fresh aroma, making clothes feel like they have been freshly bathed all day[2].
Metamucil 4-In-1 Fiber: Metamucil 4-In-1 Fiber from Procter & Gamble Co. is a plant-based psyllium fiber supplement that promotes digestive health, supports heart health by lowering cholesterol, maintains healthy blood sugar levels, and controls appetite.
SK-II Pitera: SK-II Pitera is a proprietary, naturally derived ingredient from yeast fermentation, rich in over 50 micro-nutrients, including antioxidants, vitamins, minerals, and amino acids, designed to improve skin texture and reduce visible signs of aging.
Febreze Car: Febreze Car from Procter & Gamble Co. is an innovative air freshener designed to eliminate odors and provide a fresh scent in vehicles, featuring customizable scent intensity and a modern, discreet design.
Oral-B Cross Action: Oral-B CrossAction from Procter & Gamble Co. is a manual toothbrush featuring angled bristles that flex and straighten to penetrate between teeth and along the gumline, effectively removing up to 99% of plaque in hard-to-reach areas.
Old Spice: Old Spice, a Procter & Gamble brand, offers a range of male grooming products including aftershaves, deodorants, antiperspirants, shampoos, body washes, shaving cream, and soaps, known for its distinctive nautical theme and classic scents.
Oral-B Encias Detox: Oral-B Encias Detox is a toothpaste from Procter & Gamble Co. that eliminates bacteria in hard-to-reach areas, promoting healthier gums and a refreshing sensation after brushing[1][4].
Olay Super Eyes: Olay Super Eyes Daily Eye Serum is a 5-in-1 eye serum from Procter & Gamble Co., offering benefits like instant brightening, cooling, and hydration, with key ingredients like Vitamin C, Niacinamide, and Amino Peptides to refresh and firm the skin around the eyes[1][4].
Ivory: Ivory is an American flagship personal care brand from Procter & Gamble, known for its pure and gentle white bar soap that floats on water, with a history dating back to 1879[1][4][5].
Swiffer Powermop: The Swiffer PowerMop from Procter & Gamble Co. is an all-in-one, battery-powered spray mop that offers a convenient and effective cleaning solution for various hard floor surfaces, featuring multi-surface mopping pads with 300+ scrubbing strips and a fresh scent solution[1][2][3].
Downy Soft: Downy Soft from Procter & Gamble Co. is a fabric softener that infuses fabrics with silky softness, reduces wrinkles, and fights static cling, providing long-lasting freshness and protection to clothes[4][5].
Dayquil Severe: DayQuil Severe from Procter & Gamble Co. is a maximum strength, non-drowsy daytime cold and flu relief medication that temporarily relieves 9 symptoms including coughing, stuffy nose, minor body pain, chest congestion, sinus congestion, sinus pressure, sore throat, headache, and fever[1].
Secret Fresh Defense: Secret Fresh Defense from Procter & Gamble Co. offers 72-hour breathable sweat and odor protection, ensuring long-lasting freshness and confidence throughout the day[1][2].

Naturella: Naturella is a brand of feminine hygiene products, owned by Procter & Gamble, known for its use of chamomile extract in pads and tampons that provide comfort and hypoallergenic protection for women.
Gillette ProGlide: Gillette ProGlide is a high-performance men's razor from Procter & Gamble Co., featuring five antifriction blades, microfins for skin smoothing, an enhanced lubrastrip for comfort, FlexBall technology for contour adaptation, and a precision trimmer for styling and hard-to-reach areas[1][3][5].
Art Of Shaving: The Art of Shaving, a high-end men's grooming brand acquired by Procter & Gamble Co. in 2009, offers luxury shaving and skin care products known for their natural ingredients and clinical testing for sensitive skin.

Native Candy Shop: Native Candy Shop is a line of candy-inspired, sweetly scented personal care products from Procter & Gamble Co., featuring deodorants, body washes, shampoos, and conditioners with fragrances like Gummy Bear and Strawberry & Vanilla[3][4].
Always Infinity: Always Infinity from Procter & Gamble Co. is a revolutionary feminine care product featuring FlexFoam material that absorbs 10 times its weight, providing unparalleled comfort and protection with a unique, form-fitting design[2][5].
Olay Ultra Moisture: Olay Ultra Moisture from Procter & Gamble Co. is a line of body washes and moisturizers that provide long-lasting hydration and visibly transform skin with its advanced formulas, backed by 60 years of skin science[1][4].

Gillette Labs: Gillette Labs is a premium sub-brand from Procter & Gamble Co., known for innovative shaving products like the exfoliating razor, which combines shaving and exfoliation in one stroke, offering a close and comfortable shaving experience[1][2][4].
Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength: Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength is a line of extra-strength shampoos from Procter & Gamble Co., designed to provide fast, powerful relief from severe dandruff, dryness, and itchiness, using ingredients like 1% selenium sulfide and manuka honey[1][2][4].
Bounce: Bounce, a brand owned by Procter & Gamble, specializes in fabric care products like dryer sheets that reduce static cling, fight wrinkles, and soften fabrics, offering long-lasting freshness and convenience in laundry care.
Herbal Essences: Herbal Essences is a brand of hair care products by Procter & Gamble, known for its natural ingredients, sulfate-free formulations, and commitment to sustainability and cruelty-free practices.
Downy Light: Downy Light Scent Booster Beads from Procter & Gamble Co. are small, lightly scented laundry beads that provide 4x longer-lasting freshness without heavy perfumes, dyes, or phosphates, making them safe for all colors and fabrics[1][2][4].
Always Radiant: Always Radiant from Procter & Gamble Co. offers a range of menstrual pads featuring FlexFoam technology for 100% leak and odor-free protection, designed to provide comfort and style with various absorbency levels and trendy designs[1][3][4].
Charmin: Charmin is a leading American brand of toilet paper, established in 1928 and owned by Procter & Gamble, known for its softness and innovative products like Charmin To Go for away-from-home use[1][3][5].
Charmin Extra Strong: Charmin Ultra Strong from Procter & Gamble Co. is a 2-ply toilet paper known for its diamond weave texture, 4X strength when wet, and clog-safe and septic-safe properties, providing a long-lasting and confident clean[1][4].
Olay Indulgent Moisture: Olay Indulgent Moisture Body Wash, from Procter & Gamble Co., is a luxurious, 24-hour moisturizing body wash infused with Vitamin B3 and various fragrances, designed to provide hydrating and nourishing benefits for visibly glowing skin[1][2][3].
Pampers Swaddlers: Pampers Swaddlers from Procter & Gamble Co. are designed with advanced leak protection, breathable layers, and ultra-absorbent cores to keep babies' skin dry and comfortable, featuring sizes up to 8 for larger babies[1][3].
Dayquil: DayQuil from Procter & Gamble Co. is a non-drowsy, daytime cold and flu medicine that provides powerful relief for symptoms such as cough, nasal congestion, sore throat, headache, and fever.
Nervive: Nervive, a line of supplements and topical creams from Procter & Gamble Co., is designed to address nerve care and pain relief, leveraging ingredients like Alpha Lipoic Acid and B vitamins to support nerve health and alleviate occasional nerve aches and discomfort[1][2][5].
Neurobion: Neurobion, a brand from Procter & Gamble Co., offers a combination of vitamins B1, B6, and B12 to help protect and nourish nerves, prevent deficiencies, and support overall nerve health.
Head & Shoulders BARE: Head & Shoulders BARE is a line of sulfate-free, silicone-free, and dye-free anti-dandruff shampoos from Procter & Gamble Co., featuring a minimalist ingredient approach and sustainable packaging with 45% less plastic per mL[1][2][4].
Dawn Power: Dawn Power from Procter & Gamble Co. is a line of dish cleaning products known for their superior grease-cutting capabilities, innovative formulas, and eco-friendly ingredients, designed to make washing dishes faster and more efficient[1][2][5].
Swiffer Sweeper: The Swiffer Sweeper from Procter & Gamble Co. is a 2-in-1 hard surface floor cleaner that combines sweeping and mopping capabilities with fluffy 3D fibers to trap and lock dirt, dust, and hair, and absorb tough messes with heavy-duty dry and wet cloths[1][2][4].
Dodot: Dodot, a brand from Procter & Gamble, offers a range of baby care products including nappies and wipes, known for their quality and comfort[3][5].
Vicks VapoPatch: Vicks VapoPatch is a non-medicated, wearable aroma patch from Procter & Gamble Co. that provides soothing Vicks vapors through a blend of eucalyptus and essential oils, menthol, and camphor, lasting up to 8 hours[1][4].
Old Spice Swagger: Old Spice Swagger is a line of male grooming products, including body sprays and deodorants, known for their fresh scents and long-lasting odor protection, manufactured by Procter & Gamble Co. [1][2][4]
Downy Ultra: Downy Ultra from Procter & Gamble Co. is a fabric conditioner that provides 7 benefits, including lasting freshness, color protection, softness, stretch fighter, wrinkle reduction, anti-static, and anti-fuzz, leaving clothes feeling softer, smelling fresher, and looking newer[1][4].
Nervive Nerve Relief: Nervive Nerve Relief from Procter & Gamble Co. is a dietary supplement designed to help alleviate occasional nerve aches, discomfort, and weakness due to aging, using a blend of Alpha Lipoic Acid, B Complex Vitamins, and herbal extracts like Turmeric and Ginger[1][2][5].
Gillette Venus: Gillette Venus, a line from Procter & Gamble Co., offers a range of razors and shaving products designed for women, featuring multiple blades, moisture strips, and ergonomic handles for a smooth and comfortable shaving experience[1][4].

Nativa: Native, a Procter & Gamble Co. brand, offers clean and simple personal care products, including deodorants, hair care, and body wash, using naturally derived ingredients and a subscription model, targeting health-conscious consumers with a focus on sustainability and cruelty-free practices[1][2][4].
Vicks Vapo Freeze: Vicks Vapo Freeze is a pain-relieving cream from Procter & Gamble Co., designed to provide fast and targeted relief for sore muscles, backaches, strains, bruises, sprains, and everyday joint pain.
Head & Shoulders Itchy Scalp Care: Head & Shoulders Itchy Scalp Care is a paraben-free, clinically proven anti-dandruff shampoo from Procter & Gamble Co., featuring eucalyptus scent and providing up to 100% dandruff protection.
Downy April Fresh: Downy April Fresh from Procter & Gamble Co. is a liquid fabric softener that provides long-lasting freshness and softness to clothes, reducing static cling and leaving a floral scent[1][2][4].
Zzzquil: ZzzQuil is a non-habit forming, over-the-counter (OTC) sleep aid from Procter & Gamble Co., containing diphenhydramine HCl to help reduce sleep onset time and improve sleep quality for occasional sleeplessness in adults and children over 12 years old[1][2].
Align: Align, a health and wellness brand owned by Procter & Gamble, offers a range of probiotic supplements designed to support gastrointestinal health and maintain digestive balance.
Vicks Vaporub: Vicks VapoRub is a mentholated topical ointment by Procter & Gamble, used to relieve coughs and minor muscle and joint pains, containing active ingredients like camphor, eucalyptus oil, and menthol[1][3][4].
Pampers Club: Pampers Club is a loyalty program by Procter & Gamble Co. that rewards parents with cash and discounts for scanning diaper and wipe codes, offering exclusive deals, parenting tips, and personalized diapering recommendations[1][2][4].
Gillette Specialized: Gillette, a brand of Procter & Gamble Co., specializes in personal care products including safety razors, shaving supplies, electric shavers, toothbrushes, and other grooming essentials.
Downy Rinse & Refresh: Downy Rinse & Refresh is a breakthrough laundry odor remover from Procter & Gamble Co., designed to dissolve and break down odor-causing residues, providing 3X odor-fighting power compared to detergent alone[1][3][4].
Pantene Pro-V: Pantene Pro-V is a line of hair care products from Procter & Gamble, known for its nourishing and hydrating formulas that promote healthy, strong, and beautiful hair.
Olay Body: Olay Body, a brand from Procter & Gamble Co., offers a range of skincare products, including body washes and lotions, designed to enhance skin health and appearance with scientifically-backed ingredients like niacinamide, collagen, and hyaluronic acid[1][2][5].
Pepto Kids: Pepto Kids, from Procter & Gamble Co., is an antacid chewable tablet designed to provide fast relief from heartburn, acid indigestion, sour stomach, and upset stomach for children, available in bubblegum flavor.
Always Extra Heavy Overnight: Always Extra Heavy Overnight Pads from Procter & Gamble Co. offer up to 10 hours of leak-free protection with a larger back design and advanced LeakGuard and RapidDRY technologies for superior nighttime comfort and security[1][2][4].
Gillette Intimate: Gillette Intimate is a line of pubic hair grooming products from Procter & Gamble Co., designed for men with features like waterproof trimmers, protective combs, and dermatologist-tested blades for gentle and easy intimate shaving.
Febreze: Febreze is an American brand of household odor eliminators manufactured by Procter & Gamble, offering a range of products that eliminate and neutralize unpleasant smells using patented technologies like OdorClear and hydroxypropyl beta-cyclodextrin (HPβCD) [1].
Gillette Fusion: Gillette Fusion from Procter & Gamble Co. is a high-quality shaving system featuring advanced technology, including five-blade razors and skincare products, designed to provide a comfortable and close shave while addressing various grooming needs[1][4].
Puffs Plus: Puffs Plus from Procter & Gamble Co. offers 2-ply facial tissues with lotion containing shea butter, aloe, and vitamin E to provide soothing comfort and prevent irritation.
Secret Sheer: Secret Sheer from Procter & Gamble Co. is an invisible solid antiperspirant/deodorant offering long-lasting, reliable 24-hour sweat and odor protection with a pH-balanced formula that works with the body's natural chemistry, certified cruelty-free by PETA[2][4].
Gillette Mach 3: The Gillette Mach 3 from Procter & Gamble Co. is a high-performance razor system featuring stronger-than-steel blades, designed for a close, comfortable shave with up to 15 shaves per cartridge[1][3].
Naturella Nocturna: Naturella Nocturna by Procter & Gamble Co. is a line of sanitary pads designed for nighttime use, featuring 6 zones of protection to prevent leaks and maintain skin hygiene throughout the night[3][5].
Olay Cleansing Melts: Olay Cleansing Melts are water-activated facial cleansers that transform into a rich, creamy microbubble lather, providing a gentle yet effective clean for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and are available in various formulations such as Vitamin C, Retinol, and Hyaluronic Acid[1][2][3].
Olay Cleansing & Renewing: Olay Cleansing & Renewing from Procter & Gamble Co. is a line of body washes that combines powerful ingredients like retinol and Vitamin B3 to deeply nourish and rejuvenate the skin, promoting cell turnover and reducing the appearance of fine lines and uneven skin tone[2][3][5].
Gillette SkinGuard: Gillette SkinGuard is a razor designed for men with sensitive skin, featuring patented "guard" technology that cuts hair at skin level, minimizing irritation and tug, and providing a comfortable shaving experience[1][3][4].
Bounce Pet Hair & Lint Guard: Bounce Pet Hair & Lint Guard from Procter & Gamble Co. are extra-large dryer sheets designed to effectively remove pet hair and reduce lint, while also controlling static and leaving a fresh scent[1][2][4].
Align Probiotic: Align Probiotic from Procter & Gamble Co. is a daily probiotic supplement containing the patented Bifidobacterium 35624 strain, designed to support digestive health and maintain gut balance.
Charmin Ultra: Charmin Ultra from Procter & Gamble Co. is a premium toilet paper brand offering both Ultra Soft and Ultra Strong options, known for their exceptional softness and strength, respectively, with innovative features like wavy perforation for a smoother tear[1][2][4].
Secret Whole Body: Secret Whole Body Deodorant from Procter & Gamble Co. is an aluminum-free, clinically proven 72-hour odor protection product designed for use on the entire body, available in various forms including sticks, creams, and sprays, and partnered with ThirdLove for inclusive sizing and comfort.
Vicks VapoCool: Vicks VapoCool from Procter & Gamble Co. is a line of medicated drops and lozenges that provide fast and maximum-strength relief for sore throats, featuring active ingredients like menthol and benzocaine, and are available in various flavors such as honey lemon chill[1][2][4].
Tampax Radiant: Tampax Radiant tampons from Procter & Gamble Co. offer up to 100% leak-free protection with a LeakGuard Braid, Textured Grip, and BPA-free applicator, designed for comfort and hygiene during menstruation[1][3][4].
Gain Flings: Gain Flings from Procter & Gamble Co. are single-use laundry pacs offering 3-in-1 benefits with Gain detergent, OxiBoost, and Febreze freshness, delivering 50% more scent than regular Gain liquid detergent[1][2][3].
Dreft: Dreft is a hypoallergenic laundry detergent brand from Procter & Gamble, specifically designed for baby clothes and known for its gentle, stain-fighting formula recommended by pediatricians and dermatologists[1][2][3].
Downy: Downy, a brand from Procter & Gamble Co., offers a line of advanced fabric care products that help keep clothes soft and smelling fresh, including fabric softeners, dryer sheets, and in-wash scent boosters[3].
Metamucil Fiber Plus Vitamins: Metamucil Fiber Plus Vitamins from Procter & Gamble Co. are gummies that combine plant-based fiber with vitamins C, D, and B12 to support digestive health and immune function.
Braun Series 9: The Braun Series 9 from Procter & Gamble Co. is a high-end electric shaver featuring advanced technology, including a 4-blade cutting system, Sonic Technology, and AutoSense, designed for efficient and comfortable shaving with up to 60 minutes of cordless use[1][2][5].
Safeguard: Safeguard from Procter & Gamble Co. is a line of antibacterial soaps designed to effectively remove bacteria and germs, promoting hand hygiene and cleanliness.
Always Overnight: Always Overnight Pads from Procter & Gamble Co. are designed to provide maximum protection against leakage during the night, featuring advanced materials and technologies for a comfortable and worry-free sleep[1].
Olay Hyaluronic Acid: Olay Hyaluronic Acid from Procter & Gamble Co. is a powerful hydrator that attracts and binds water molecules, providing long-lasting hydration, reducing fine lines and wrinkles, and maintaining a plump, supple skin appearance.
NyQuil High Blood Pressure: NyQuil High Blood Pressure from Procter & Gamble Co. is a sugar-free, alcohol-free, and decongestant-free liquid medicine that provides fast, powerful relief for common cold and flu symptoms, specifically designed for individuals with high blood pressure[1][4].
Swiffer Heavy Duty: Swiffer Heavy Duty from Procter & Gamble Co. offers 360-degree coated fibers that trap and lock up to 3x more dust and allergens, making it ideal for hard-to-reach areas and pet hair removal[1][2][4].
Vicks VapoStick: Vicks VapoStick is a non-medicated, easy-to-use solid balm from Procter & Gamble Co., providing soothing Vicks vapors with a no-touch application, suitable for adults and children ages 4 and up[1][4].
ZzzQuil Nighttime Sleep: ZzzQuil Nighttime Sleep from Procter & Gamble Co. is a non-habit-forming sleep aid containing diphenhydramine HCI, designed to help individuals fall asleep quickly and wake up refreshed, available in various forms including liquid and capsules[1][2][4].
ZzzQuil Ultra: ZzzQuil Ultra, from Procter & Gamble Co., is a nighttime sleep aid tablet containing 25 mg of doxylamine succinate, clinically proven to help users fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer, while being non-habit forming[1][2][4].
Mielle Organics Pomegranate & Honey: Mielle Organics Pomegranate & Honey is a line of natural hair care products by Mielle Organics, not directly affiliated with Procter & Gamble Co., but known for its moisturizing and detangling formulas featuring pomegranate extract and honey, specifically designed for thick, curly hair types.
Pampers Baby-Dry: Pampers Baby-Dry from Procter & Gamble Co. offers up to 100% leakproof nights and features three absorbent layers, a Dri-Weave Liner, and a Wetness Indicator for superior overnight protection and comfort[1][2][4].
Fixodent: Fixodent, from Procter & Gamble Co., is the #1 dentist-recommended denture adhesive brand, providing long-lasting retention and comfort for both full and partial denture wearers[2][3][5].
DayQuil Kids: DayQuil Kids from Procter & Gamble Co. is a cold and flu medication specifically designed for children aged 6 and up, providing fast relief from cough, fever, and congestion with a kid-friendly honey flavor[1][4].
Lenor: Lenor is a fabric conditioner brand from Procter & Gamble Co., known for its ability to soften and freshen laundry, with a range of products including fabric enhancers and liquid detergents[1][2][5].
Tide Washing Machine Cleaner: Tide Washing Machine Cleaner from Procter & Gamble Co. is a powder designed to remove odor-causing residues and deposits from washing machines, using its oxygenated formula with Oxi and TAED to keep machines clean and fresh.
